name: The Dream Of Dice
description:
Think of a backgammon dice, out of the 100 people who buy it to play backgammon every day, who sees no one but one person. That person is no other than the wife of a man who comes to play backgammon every day. One day, this woman kisses the dice on a lucky charm, and our dice reach endless pleasure and get lost in the world of dreams. If you are wondering about the imagination of the dice and what will happen after, here is our game to answer these questions.

How to Play:

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Jump

E - Shape Shifting
